name: play
description: (Music bot) Add a song or audio clip to the queue.

options.name: song
options.description: Provide either: a YouTube video ID, a YouTube search query, or a direct link to a supported source.

options.name: playlist
options.description: Set to True to add ALL tracks from a YouTube playlist to the queue.

options.name: forceplay
options.description: Play this track immediately, pausing any current track until the new one ends.

options.name: next
options.description: Add this track to the front of the queue rather than the end ("skipping the line")

options.name: attachment
options.description: Optionally play an attached audio file directly. The 'song' text will be ignored.

options.name: volume
options.description: Set the volume level for this track (for example, if this track is known to be very quiet)
